q1: Do you think Barcelona will win La Liga next season?
a1: No, I think Real Madrid will win next year.
q2: Do you think Barcelona will keep Lionel Messi for his entire career?
a2: I know Barcelona will keep Lionel Messi for his entire career. They have recently agreed on a contract to keep him until the summer of 2021. Which it looks like thats all the man wants for the rest of career is just them few more years.
